Structs/KNDatesUtils.html#/s:10KNContact.abstract: Helper method to return a DateFormatter object to be used in formatted

Structs/KNDatesUtils.html#/s:10KNContact.abstract: Helper method that returns a formatted date as a string, accepting a KNTimeFormat value.

Structs/KNDatesUtils.html#/s:10KNContact.name: string(from:format:locale:)
Structs/KNDatesUtils.html#/s:10KNContact.abstract: Helper method that returns a formatted date as a string, aceppting a custom date format as a string. E.g. “YYYY-MM-DD”

Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html#/s:10KNC.name: format
Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html#/s:10KNC.abstract: The time format to save the schedule in

Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html#/s:10KNC.abstract: Initialises a KNContactSchedule with a name and time format.

Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html#/s:10KNC.name: add(list:to:)
Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html#/s:10KNC.abstract: Adds multiple contact identifers to the schedule for a particular day passed as Date type.

Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html#/s:10KNC.name: add(list:to:)
Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html#/s:10KNC.abstract: Adds multiple contact identifers to the schedule for a particular day passed as a String type.

Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html#/s:10KNC.name: getSchedule(for:)
Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html#/s:10KNC.abstract: Retrieves the schedule for a particular day

Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html#/s:10KNC.abstract: Retrieves the schedule for the current day.

Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html#/s:10KNC.name: reset()
Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html#/s:10KNC.abstract: Resets the schedule by invalidating the stored schedule collection.

Structs/KNContactBookOrdering.html#/s:10.name: thisYearsBirthday
Structs/KNContactBookOrdering.html#/s:10.abstract: Closure method to sort contact by their birthday during current year in ascending order (earlier first).

Structs/KNContactBookOrdering.html#/s:10.name: fullName
Structs/KNContactBookOrdering.html#/s:10.abstract: Closure method to sort contact by their full name in ascending order (alphabetical order).

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.name: info
Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: A CNContact object representing the wrapped contact information.

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Initialises a KNContact object by wrapping a CNContact.

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.name: init(_:)
Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Initialises a KNContact object by wrapping a CNContact.

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.name: fullName(format:)
Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Returns the full name of contacts using a formatting style (fullName or phoneticFullName).

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.name: getBirthday(forCurrentYear:)
Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Returns the birthday of the contact as an optional date, if the contact has birthday information is available.

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.name: formatBirthday(with:forCurrentYear:)
Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Helper method to return a formatted birthday using a KNTimeFormat.

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Helper method to return a formatted birthday using a string representing a date formatt.

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.name: getFirstPhoneNumber()
Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Helper method to get the first phone number available for the contact as string.

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.name: getFirstEmailAddress()
Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Helper method to get the first email address available for the contact as string.

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.name: isBirthdayToday()
Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Helper method to find out if current date matches the contact’s birthday.

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.name: birthdayMatches(date:)
Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Helper method to find out if current date matches the contact’s birthday.

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.name: isBirthdayComing(in:startingDate:)
Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Helper method to find out if contact has an upcoming birthday in the following days.

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.name: getAge(atNextBirthday:)
Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Helper method to find out if a contact’s age.

Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.name: getAgeAsString(atNextBirthday:asOrdinal:)
Structs/KNContact.html#/s:10KNContacts9K.abstract: Helper method to retrieve a contact’s age as string with option for current or turning age and an ordinal value e.g.
Implementation of Comparable protocol, by comparing the contact identifiers
Implementation of Equatable protocol, by checking if the contact identifiers match

Structs/KNContact.html.name: KNContact
Structs/KNContact.html.abstract: KNContact class is a wrapper class which gives quick access to helper methods for a CNContact, like their full name,

Structs/KNContactBookOrdering.html.name: KNContactBookOrdering
Structs/KNContactBookOrdering.html.abstract: Helper struct with helper closures to help with sorting contacts either in a collection of KNContact objects or a KNContactBook.

Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html.name: KNContactsSchedule
Structs/KNContactsSchedule.html.abstract: A collection of contact identifier strings grouped by a time format to create contact schedules.

Structs/KNDatesUtils.html.name: KNDatesUtils
Structs/KNDatesUtils.html.abstract: Helper struct which returns date formatters or formatted strings by using the formet formatter.

Enums/KNDateTimeFormat.html#/s:10KNConta.name: dayAndMonth
Enums/KNDateTimeFormat.html#/s:10KNConta.abstract: Date format represented as “d MMM”. E.g. “1 Jan”

Enums/KNDateTimeFormat.html#/s:10KNConta.name: dayAndFullMonth
Enums/KNDateTimeFormat.html#/s:10KNConta.abstract: Date format represented as “d MMMM”. E.g. “1 January”

Enums/KNDateTimeFormat.html.name: KNDateTimeFormat
Enums/KNDateTimeFormat.html.abstract: Enum helper, returns a String that represents a time format such as “HH:mm”, “yyyy-MM-dd”.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: identifiers
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: An read-only list of all identifiers used to retrieve the contacts by in the contact book.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: contacts
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: A read-only array list of all contacts in the contact book.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: contactIdentifiers
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: A read-only array list of all contact identifiers stored in the contact book.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: count
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: The number of entries in the contact book

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: init(id:)
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: Initialiser with an identifier representing a way to name or identify the contact book.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: getContact(by:)
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: Retrieves a KNContact from the contact book by using the passed key identifier.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: getContacts(by:)
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: Retrieves multiple KNContact objects from the contact book by using the passed array of KNContacts.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: getContacts(by:)
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: Retrieves multiple KNContact objects from the contact book by using the passed array of KNContacts.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: add(_:)
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: Appends a KNContact to the contact book, identified by the contacts identifier.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: add(_:id:)
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: Appends a KNContact to the contact book, identified with the passed id parameter

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: add(_:)
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: Appends multiple KNContact object to the contact book, identified by the contacts identifiers.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: remove(_:)
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: Removes a KNContact from the contact book if it can find it in the contact book by the passed String identifier.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: remove(_:)
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: Removes a KNContact from the contact book if it can find it in the contact book.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: remove(_:)
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: Removes multiple KNContactobjects from the contact book if it can find them in the contact book.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: randomElements(number:except:)
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: A method to return a number of random elements from the contact book.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: contains(element:)
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: Checks if the contact book contains the passed KNContact.

Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.name: reset()
Classes/KNContactBook.html#/s:10KNContac.abstract: Resets the contact book by invalidating the stored contact entries.

Classes/KNContactBook.html.abstract: KNContactBook class is a collection of KNContact objects to help with
